channel.title: Process on Marc Runkel's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Process on Marc Runkel's Blog

item.title: The only important rule of the Scrum process.
item.description: There are many blog posts about scrum.  There are sacred texts and high-priests.   Most of that stuff is malarkey.    If your company has a full time Agile Coach, run for the hills.   Also, if you’re a full time agile coach, stop reading. You’re not going to like what I say.
